name: I Became the Husband of the Cult Leader of the Demonic Sect
author: 성대호
content: One of the Six Divine Clans of the Heavenly Demon Sect, the great heir of the Majin Jin Clan, Jin Yeomyeong.Grateful for being born with a golden spoon in my mouth, I just wanted to enjoy a sweet life...But damn that Murim Alliance — they destroyed the Heavenly Demon Sect.And in the final moments of my life, the cult leader Cheon Yura says to me:“Would you seduce me?”
